message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be happy to pay $150 for it.  What do you think?
Thanks for your understanding, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $165. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $165 is still a little more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm sticking to my original offer of $150. If you're willing to accept that, I'm ready to buy the product.
